caption.p: Nonmultidimensional scaling (NMDS) showing ASVs between hydrocarbon (T2, T4) and nonhydrocarbon (T1, T3) treatments. T1 = plant species only ( G. barbadense, H rufa T diversifolia, O longistaminata. and S. arundinaceum), T2 = Plant species and hydrocarbon (0, 75 g·kg −1), T3 = Plant species and manure (0, 2 tha −1), and T4 = Plant species, manure, hydrocarbon.
